Title: P. Leconte 8
Description: Fragment of papyrus inscribed in Demotic with part of a previously unknown literary text about a singer who came ot Egypt from Tunip in Syria. = P. Leconte 8.
Curator's comments: See D. Bonneau et al. Les Papyrus Leconte, Actes de XVe Congres international de papyrologie III (1979), 25-6; also P. Leconte I in RdE 30 (1978). Devuchelle (pers. comm. 6.2000) notes that Leconte bought the papyri from R. Lambert who published a Lexique hieroglyphique chez Geuthner in 1925. Lambert had a military career; Devauchelle suuggests that he may have bought the papyri before WWII quand il etait en exercice et interesse par l'Egypte. To be published by Devauchelle.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (80216) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/80216)
